name: Player ZX
description:
This is a Megaman like game I made last year around July. I am making this game public because I think there is fun to be enjoyed in this project I was just sharing with just my friends.

I made this game based on mega man because it would let me create with a good way to select the content and try new things per block. 

This game has a lot of my inexperience with coding such as controller support for Xbox one controllers (only/maybe?) and unity's features such as using unity's standard text instead unity's text mesh pro. 

The game also has a lot of test material such as a town with two NPCs (Dialogue may cause cringing) and outdated text such as the tutorial (that I can't fix).

Any feed back is very much appreciated.

Hope you enjoy the game! (B^}

For the best experience:

  • Hit full screen button
  • Xbox one controller
  • Gameplay mod "hold to run" set to ON, and the rest of the Gameplay mods turned off
    • For the tutorial all Gameplay mods must be on.

Content 

  • A tutorial
  • 5 Bosses 
    • Phantom Pharaoh (inspired by DMC5's Urizen)
    • Nightly Nightmare (Design inspired by DMC5's Days of V nightmare)
    • Bellowing Bat (inspired by DMC5's Artimis)
    • Nova Fish (inspired by Gunvolt's Nova)
    • Cage Chandelier 
  • A town and NPC Test
  • 2 Blank spots

Gameplay

  • Run and gun with a chargeable primary projectile and a chargeable secondary projectile
  • Meter that increases with primary shots that is used for secondary shots.
  • Ground dash and Air dash
  • Wall jumping
  • Secondary Weapon swap with player color change
    • Spread shot
    • "Broken" Shot
    • Sine Shot
    • Delay Shot
  • Gameplay mods
    • Chargeable primary and secondary projectile toggle
    • Swappable secondary projectile toggle
    • Ground dash hold to run toggle
  • Boss ranking based on health from S -> D

This game contains assets from other creators such as Gunvolt's sprites and transistor's music. 

Assets used belong to their original creators. If this game offends or infringes on any of the creators creations in this game the game will be taken down.
